snippet.title: A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead – Official First Story Trailer
snippet.description: Enjoy the first story trailer for A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead, the upcoming first-person single-player horror game from developer Stormind and publisher Saber Interactive that's inspired by the movies of the same name. You play as Alex, an asthmatic college student trying to survive the end of the world with her boyfriend Martin.
